body.p:
Liberty 7th May 62
T His Exallency B M Magoffin

I not long since joined in a petition to your excellency for the remission of some anticipated judgements in the pulaski Circuit Court in behalf of the commonwealth vs Adam Horper I now with great earnestness repeat that petition I have no doubt of the justness & propriety of your interposition and earnestly hope you will find it concistant with with your views of official duty to ^do so^ with sentiments of very high regard I remain your friend
Nb if you shall interpose in behalf of of Mr Horper enclose to his fatherinlaw John Ousley at Lancaster Ky
